thread.title: Myanmar: Almost 100 prisoners of conscience behind bars ahead of elections (Amnesty International Australia)
thread.title_full: Myanmar: Almost 100 prisoners of conscience behind bars ahead of elections (Amnesty International Australia) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Myanmar: Almost 100 prisoners of conscience behind bars ahead of elections (Amnesty International Australia)
text: ( Source : Amnesty International Australia ) Myanmar 's authorities have been locking up and harassing scores of peaceful activists as part of an intensifying and far-reaching crackdown ahead of November's elections, Amnesty International said,
